title: Two Weeks Free Rent! Beach 1BD Loft in unit Laundry!
app_fee: $50 application fee per applicant and $200 holding deposit
posting_body: ['Amazing, Non-smoking buildings, Fantastic floorplans, two blocks from the beach with Spacious closets, Great Price!', 'Perfect Location!', '*Limited time special 2 weeks free rent unit #G321, video link = https://youtu.be/1ysOEHQex7w', 'Please check out our website: <URL> or call', 'show contact info', 'for information and virtual tours.', 'The Lifestyle You Want Awaits You at The Gallery at Playa Pacifica!!', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'Today for Social Distancing Tours or Virtual tour of Your New Home!!', 'An intimate community hidden away from close to the beach, close to dining, shopping, and entertainment.', 'The Gallery at Playa Pacifica will treat you to the lifestyle you deserve!', 'Studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans designed with you in mind, that include gourmet kitchens, plush interior and white cabinetry.', 'Walk-in closets are a few of the added bonuses in your new home!', 'Sparkling pools, fitness center, and sculptured landscaping throughout are delightful ways to rest!', 'The Gallery at Playa Pacifica provides a unique way of living!', 'Come see for yourself why our community is the perfect place to call home!', 'Schedule an In Person Social Distancing Tour or Virtual Tour Today to See the Apartment and All Our Amenities.', 'Pet Policy: We are pet friendly.', 'Please contact our leasing office for details', 'Parking: Assigned Parking Space in Parking Garage $20-55/month', 'We offer six or 13 month leases only.', '*Pricing, specials and availability subject to change daily*', 'Services:', '24 hr. laundry facilities', 'Controlled Access', '24 hr. maintenance on call', 'Courtesy Patrol', 'Recycling', 'Fitness Center', 'Smoke-free buildings', 'Features:', 'Balcony/patio (available in some apartments)', 'Cable Ready',
